moves.name: Steel Beam
moves.effect: The user takes damage equal to 50% of its maximum HP. The damage is taken even when the attack fails.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of making the target flinch.

moves.name: Top This!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s critical-hit rate by 2 stat ranks. Applies the Supereffective ↑ Next effect to the user. Applies the Free Move Next effect to the user. Applies the Gradual Healing effect to the user. Lowers the user’s Sp. Def by 1 stat rank.

passives.name: Standfast 9
passives.description: Reduces recoil damage received from using moves that have recoil in the effect tag.

passives.name: Ferocious Entry 4
passives.description: Raises the user’s Attack and Sp. Atk by 4 stat ranks when it enters a battle.

passives.name: Head Start 1
passives.description: Reduces the user’s sync move countdown by 1 the first time it enters a battle each battle.

grid.bonus: Rock Slide:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Dragon Pulse:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Dragon Pulse:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Steel Beam:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Top This!:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Stoic 2- Has a chance (30%) of raising the user’s Defense by one stat rank after its Pokémon uses a move.
Sand Shelter- Protects the user from damage from a sandstorm.
Unflappable- Prevents the user from flinching.
Surging Sand 3- Powers up the user’s moves during a sandstorm.
Tough Cookie- The more the user’s Defense is raised, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
Grand Entry 2- Raises the user’s Sp. Atk by 2 stat ranks when it enters a battle.
Sands of Time 3- Quickly charges the move gauge during a sandstorm.
Burst In- Applies the Critical Hit Next effect to the user when it enters a battle.
Focus Rush 1- Raises the user’s critical-hit rate by 1 stat rank after using its sync move.
Sand Blaster 5- Powers up sync moves during a sandstorm.
Pinpoint Entry 1- Raises the user’s accuracy by 1 stat rank when it enters a battle.
Entry Freebie- Applies the Free Move Next effect to the user when it enters a battle.
Recoil Removal- Negates recoil damage when using moves that have recoil in the effect tag.
Supreme Entry- Applies the Supereffective ↑ Next effect to the user when it enters a battle.
